text: -rvA EqtaM dI$kShayantiq sa RuqtuBi#rEqva viqmucyO# mAqtEva# puqtraM pRu#thiqvI pu#rIqShya#mityA#haq-rtuBi#rEqvaina#M dIkShayiqtvartuBiqrvi mu#~jcati vaiSvAnaqryA Siqkya#mA da#ttE svaqdaya#tyEqvaina#-nnair.RuqtIH kRuqShNA-stiqsra-stuSha#pakvA Bavantiq nir.Ru#tyaiq vA Eqtad-BA#gaqdhEyaqM ~Myat tuShAq nir.Ru#tyai rUqpaM kRuqShNa(gm) rUqpENaiqva nir.Ru#tiM niqrava#dayata iqmAM diSa#M ~MyantyEqShA - [  ] 22
